title: Restricted mode while at school for students managed by their parents
body: In some places it is a problem that children are playing with their phones while in a class. There must be a way to handle this kind of problem, like statistics on how many times an app was started, or not being able to start applications other than some basic apps.

comments.body: Not responding to this call may end up someone at Microsoft being directly responsible for lessening the efficiency of the education in certain countries and circumstances. Please, respond at least with a comment. Thank you very much.
I guess it should be addressed with other phone OS-es together (Android, Iphone).
